content.raw:
I addressed the comments following the same conventions as the previous one. Conflicts were solved. The elements are alphabetically sorted and they include a Default option. The Hardware Dropdown behaves identically to the Region Dropdown.

ptal @chapulina

Here is a screenshot showing the changes.
